refactor_prompts.Add Comments:
Add comments to every part which might not be understandable at first glance. Add comments like this.
```gdscript
# This code does this...
<the code>
```
refactor_prompts.Explain in comments: Add a comment to every single line of code, explaining exactly what it does. Do not shy away from explaining simple code. Do not add empty newlines.
refactor_prompts.Optimize: Whereever possible, improve the performance of the code. Add comments to the changes you made. Do not add comments to code which is unchaged.
refactor_prompts.Readability: Improve the readablility of the code by seperating it into chunks by inserting empty newlines.
refactor_prompts.Shorten: Make my code as compact and short as possible, even if it reduces readbility.
refactor_prompts.Type Hints: Add type hints whereever it is possible. I don't want to see a single type-less variable or function! If a function doesn't return anything, write -> void at the end
